entry.title: mohd-abrar-ali/whitelistMinting-core-sage: A lightweight smart contract module for whitelist-based NFT minting. Features include address management, mint limits, time windows, and optional signature verification. Built with Solidity and OpenZeppelin, optimized for easy integration and gas efficiency.
entry.content: A lightweight smart contract module for whitelist-based NFT minting. Features include address management, mint limits, time windows, and optional signature verification. Built with Solidity and OpenZeppelin, optimized for easy integration and gas efficiency.

entry.title: jibon-roy/smart-country-code: A lightweight utility package providing an extensive list of country codes (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2, alpha-3, and numeric codes) along with country names for smart lookups, mapping, and validation in Node.js or browser environments.
